title: Metaverse-ready
text:
1. Develop Internet Made event space in Sandbox (already bought land, coordinates are -10, -79). Holders will be able to display, shop and sell Internet Made NFTs there Q1 2022

2. Holders of genesis NFT collection with exclusive traits will get a metaverse NFT wearable airdrop Q2 2022

3. All our avatars from the genesis collection are made with 3D software, so you will be able to use them in the metaverse. TBA

title: Internet Made ecosystem.
text: People staking their IM NFTs will be receiving IM token, redeemable for exclusive digital and physical items, as well as real world events <u>Q2 2022</u>.

title: Fashion community
text:
1. Physical pieces for community members Q1 2022

2. Collaborations with fashion houses & talented creatives Q2 2022

3. Internet Made popups in fashion capitals Q3 2022

4. Fashion Accelerator DAO - Community will be able to participate and decide on our collaborations, funding for talented designers that need capital and platform to release their creations Q3 2022
